verses.english: Woe to every scorner and mocker
verses.hausa: Bone ya tabbata ga duk mai nune, mai zunɗe (mai raɗa).

verses.english: Who collects wealth and [continuously] counts it.
verses.hausa: Wanda ya tara dũkiya, kuma ya mayar da ita abar tattalinsa.

verses.english: He thinks that his wealth will make him immortal.
verses.hausa: Yana zaton cẽwa dũkiyarsa za ta dawwamar da shi.

verses.english: No! He will surely be thrown into the Crusher.
verses.hausa: A'aha! Lalle ne zã a jẽfa shi a cikin Huɗama.

verses.english: And what can make you know what is the Crusher?
verses.hausa: Kuma me ya sanar da kai abin da ake ce wa Huɗama?

verses.english: It is the fire of Allah, [eternally] fueled,
verses.hausa: Wutar Allah ce wadda ake hurawa.

verses.english: Which mounts directed at the hearts.
verses.hausa: Wadda take lẽƙãwa a kan zukata.

verses.english: Indeed, Hellfire will be closed down upon them
verses.hausa: Lalle ne ita abar kullẽwa cea kansu.
